column4: Getting wireless working with Ubuntu seem like pipe dream for the most part
With  bcm43xx-fwcutter  do you still need a driver file ?
no.  if you have a broadcom wifi card, the bcm43xx-fwcutter will do it... you must have a dell laptop.
ah.  dell brands a broadcomm card as their own "true mobile" but still utilize the broadcom drivers... it should still work out for you though.
